fuck this shit, i'll never watch ureshii/frostii releases again

Good quality video, nice choice of font. Great job throughout the whole series.
Ureshii rarely disappoints with their subbing work, and despite a sudden halt in subbing Dennou Coil, they picked it back up later on and still finished it instead of moving on. Thumbs up.
Best one at this time. Great TS, subbing and quality.. kinda slow.
It's good =]

innaccurate translations

The translation was good and they were I believe the only group that bothered to finish subbing this great series.

thorough, and not overly simplified

Definetly the best subbers out there for Denno Coil.
An EXCELLENT job subbing this series.Did a showed great effort typesetting all the data shown on screens throughout the show.Highly recommend this group for people picking up this series.

they're not the fastest but when they release something,you know you'll get great qualities,so,if you can't wait for the next episode get it from another group,but be sure to come back and watch their release later (this goes for anything they sub)
Good work in Denno Coil, i just think that their notes are TOO fast.
This is my first Ureshii series and it's been flawless. I consider them 1st tier now.
Very accurate subs and translationsI love the way they translate the things on walls and everything. they did a VERY good job.
Brilliant subs. They even translate the credits!
Excellent subs, great video quality, perfect timing.
translation looks very good and it's easy to understand for people weak in english like me ;)
Watchable, but some untranslated words like "otoshidama" and "busue", and an untranslated computerscreen early on that was pretty important. Translator notes are annoying and unnecessary too.
Excellent translation, in sync and great template

Only the blind praises these. Just because the flow & grammar are ok does NOT mean the subs are good, as the level of fabrication is criminal, with non-existent dialogue regularly being inserted into the text. Translators should translate, not scriptwrite
